item.title: The Witch (2015)
item.description:
The Witch (2015)

I find jump scares scary. But I don't find them fun. Well done everyone, you got me! The intense orchestra, the clever editing and the make-up / cgi department all came together, and I got scared... Round of applause

item.title: Parasite I & II (2015)
item.description:
Parasite I & II (2015)

Live action alternatives to successful anime doesn't always work when it comes to Japanese cinema, especially in recent years. But there are exceptions to prove the rule... or something.
